title: Space.io
about: A application used to educate the user on space with images, searches and fun facts using javascript, css, html and API calls

title: Helping Hands
about: A website to connect volunteers with potential opportunities using Node.JS, handlebars, Express.JS, and MySQL.

title: Eat Da Burger
about: A burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!)

title: Fitness Tracker
about: A workout tracker using a Mongo database with a Mongoose schema while handling routes with Express.

title: Weather Dashboard
about: Build a weather dashboard that will run in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS.

title: Budget Tracker
about: For this assignment, you'll add functionality to our existing Budget Tracker application to allow for offline access and functionality.
